;============================================================================== ; cas_lut ; ;============================================================================== function cas_lut ;---------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Define the lookup table -- ; IDL seems to have limits on array concatenation, so we first ; define the LUT in four separate quarters and then concatenate those ;---------------------------------------------------------------------- lut0 = [ 1, 3, 5, 7, 9, 11, 14, 16, $ 19, 22, 25, 28, 31, 35, 38, 42, $ 46, 49, 53, 57, 61, 65, 70, 74, $ 79, 83, 88, 93, 98, 103, 108, 113, $ 119, 125, 130, 136, 142, 148, 154, 160, $ 166, 173, 179, 186, 193, 199, 206, 213, $ 221, 228, 236, 243, 251, 259, 267, 275, $ 283, 291, 299, 307, 316, 324, 333, 342 ] lut1 = [ 351, 360, 369, 379, 388, 398, 407, 417, $ 427, 437, 447, 457, 467, 478, 488, 499, $ 509, 520, 531, 542, 554, 565, 576, 588, $ 600, 611, 623, 635, 647, 659, 672, 684, $ 697, 709, 722, 735, 747, 761, 774, 787, $ 801, 814, 828, 842, 856, 870, 884, 898, $ 912, 926, 941, 955, 970, 985, 1000, 1015, $ 1030, 1045, 1061, 1076, 1092, 1108, 1124, 1140 ] lut2 = [ 1156, 1172, 1188, 1204, 1221, 1237, 1254, 1271, $ 1288, 1305, 1322, 1339, 1357, 1374, 1392, 1410, $ 1428, 1446, 1464, 1482, 1500, 1518, 1537, 1555, $ 1574, 1593, 1612, 1631, 1650, 1669, 1689, 1708, $ 1728, 1748, 1768, 1788, 1808, 1828, 1848, 1868, $ 1889, 1909, 1930, 1951, 1971, 1993, 2014, 2035, $ 2057, 2078, 2100, 2121, 2143, 2165, 2187, 2209, $ 2232, 2254, 2276, 2299, 2322, 2344, 2367, 2390] lut3 = [ 2413, 2437, 2460, 2484, 2507, 2531, 2555, 2579, $ 2603, 2627, 2651, 2676, 2700, 2725, 2749, 2774, $ 2799, 2824, 2849, 2874, 2900, 2925, 2951, 2977, $ 3003, 3029, 3055, 3081, 3107, 3133, 3160, 3186, $ 3213, 3239, 3266, 3293, 3321, 3348, 3375, 3403, $ 3430, 3458, 3486, 3514, 3542, 3570, 3598, 3627, $ 3655, 3684, 3712, 3741, 3770, 3799, 3828, 3857, $ 3887, 3916, 3946, 3976, 4005, 4035, 4065, 4095 ] return, [lut0, lut1, lut2, lut3] end ;==============================================================================
